identity.name: Emergent Clone - Neon Dev
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix IDE utility with Sci-Fi aesthetics
Emotion First: Every interaction feels powerful and precise
Content is King: Code is the hero; UI recedes
Zoom In: Focus on syntax highlighting and terminal details
Negative Space: Use black voids to make neon pop
Contrast: High contrast text for readability, glowing accents for action

headings.usage: Landing page titles, Feature headers, Modal titles

code.usage: Code editors, terminal outputs, file paths, snippets

rules: Overlines must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetrical spans. Hero: col-span-8. Filler: col-span-4.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.rules: Dense, 100% height utilization. No jagged bottoms.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(6,182,212,0.6)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-md

cards.classes: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl

inputs.classes: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary text-white font-mono rounded-md

surfaces.header: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5 sticky top-0 z-50

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on dark backgrounds to prevent banding
visual_enhancers.shadows: Colored shadows for neon effects (e.g., shadow-cyan-500/20)
decorations: Code syntax snippets as background texture

motion.loading: Pulse or shimmer effects on skeletons

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use Phosphor Icons for marketing if needed.

code_screen.alt: Close up of code on screen

rules: Use 'export default function Page() ...' for pages
Use prop-types if validation is strictly needed, otherwise keep it flexible

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode is mandatory and default.
Avoid gradients on text unless it's a very large headline.
Never use pure black (#000000) for cards; use tinted dark greys.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-end, developer-focused code generation platform. Adhere strictly to the 'Electric & Neon' aesthetic. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the main dashboard. Ensure the chat interface feels like a powerful terminal. Use the 'Outfit' font for headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for all code-related text.
